body:
1.First,I install the bitcoind with version 0.17.1.I start a bitcoin private chain with -regtest.
2. I get a new address with account acc1:
  `~$: sudo bitcoin-cli getnewaddress acc1.`
I get address: 2MvMEYQAF61ZTac3GjD6Mk4vNTcutiGNWnL
 then I generate 500 blocks:
`~$:sudo bitcoin-cli generate 500.`
 so there is much money in the miner wallet now.
3 First,I send 10 bitcoin to the address of acc1 and mine:
`~$: sudo bitcoin-cli sendtoaddress 2MvMEYQAF61ZTac3GjD6Mk4vNTcutiGNWnL 10 `
`~$: sudo bitcoin-cli generate 1`
```
4. Then ,I send 5 bitcoin to the address of acc1 and mine:
 `~$: sudo bitcoin-cli sendtoaddress 2MvMEYQAF61ZTac3GjD6Mk4vNTcutiGNWnL 5 `
`~$: sudo bitcoin-cli generate 1`
5. I write this command to check the received:
`~$ sudo bitcoin-cli listreceivedbyaddress`
[
  {
    "address": "2MvMEYQAF61ZTac3GjD6Mk4vNTcutiGNWnL",
    "account": "acc1",
    "amount": 15.00000000,
    "confirmations": 1,
    "label": "acc1",
    "txids": [
      "dea7e524c7f0819e374c9216047fd2b52b2a3df9f218b33c6d196cb7a4d64638",
      "bb8381e4d6320c532c5ad6525bf8d7ce8fb0fd6a21d5831f72a0730a1da79277"
    ]
  }
]
there are 15 bitcoin in address 2MvMEYQAF61ZTac3GjD6Mk4vNTcutiGNWnL.This is OK. But the bug comming.......
6. I write this command to check the UTXO of address 2MvMEYQAF61ZTac3GjD6Mk4vNTcutiGNWnL:
`~$ sudo bitcoin-cli listunspent 1 99999999 '''["2MvMEYQAF61ZTac3GjD6Mk4vNTcutiGNWnL"]'''`
[
  {
    "txid": "dea7e524c7f0819e374c9216047fd2b52b2a3df9f218b33c6d196cb7a4d64638",
    "vout": 1,
    "address": "2MvMEYQAF61ZTac3GjD6Mk4vNTcutiGNWnL",
    "label": "acc1",
    "account": "acc1",
    "redeemScript": "00140c61ba1f5b8ca4e25144c9c2479b47a3527ddda4",
    "scriptPubKey": "a914220b55d98056c87ef8f9810d29da9917a9c77a6387",
    "amount": 5.00000000,
    "confirmations": 1,
    "spendable": true,
    "solvable": true,
    "safe": true
  }
]
there should 2 UTXO,but there is only 1 UTXO with 5 bitcoin in the result. Why? Somebody help me with this problem.Thanks!
title: the problem abount listunspent in regtest bitcoin chain
